short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides Proofbyte services to Google's Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Proofbyte for Gmail is a browser plugin for individual consumers. Proofbyte Enterprise Solution is available for organizations that use Google Apps for Business (http://www.proofbyte.com/content/proofbyte-google-apps-business) which does not require plugin installation and has additional capabilities.

Using Google Labels, Proofbyte provides consistent and non-intrusive green and red indicators to indicate trusted and untrusted senders. Additional labels indicate the sender's country of origin.

Transparent to users, outgoing messages are stamped and the incoming messages are verified and labeled. These labels are seen on any Android Gmail App and are available on all browsers. The plugin to send authentic messages is currently available for Firefox only.

Proofbyte for Gmail key benefits:

No changes to Gmail UI.
Get clear indicators if your colleagues', friends', or family members' emails get spoofed.
Get senderâ€™s country of origin
Send authentic email messages.
Invite others to join and protect yourself, your colleagues, friends, and family members from hackers.
